article.title: Thales Raytheon Supports Sentinel Radar
article.text: Thales Raytheon Systems, Fullerton, Calif. was awarded an $11,890,678 modification (P00017) to contract W31P4Q-13-C-0091 for life cycle contractor support services for the Sentinel radar system. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala. is the contracting activity.
